description: Tom Vaccaro shaves Jason Anderson's ass clean, then pretends like he doesn't know what's expected of him. When Anderson asks to be fisted, Vaccaro is more than happy to comply. Anderson writhes on a leather-covered kitchen counter as Vaccaro manhandles his ass, even pitching a few of his own fingers to help open his ass wider. Vaccaro punch fucks his ecstatic bottom then steps aside when Anderson begins fisting himself!
title: Fist for Hire 1
